name: Strategic points
description:
How to play
Click your pieces,
Choose from the available movements,
Surround the opposing pieces.
The first who reaches zero pieces loses.

To start game:
The game is only multiplayer, you need a player 2 to play.
Click quick start and when your friend or someone join the lobby click start.
Click show rooms to create a room with a name or see actual rooms

More about:
This is a classic pen and paper game ideal to play between one hour of lesson and another.

Download:
You can download apk for android or exe for windows.
The game is cross platform, so feel free to use your favourite device to play with friends
